currentPost.title: Reaching Out to Families in Need
currentPost.excerpt: While it is easy to become absorbed in smartphones, celebrity gossip and the latest summer movie blockbuster, there are people [ More.. ]
currentPost.content:
While it is easy to become absorbed in smartphones, celebrity gossip and the latest summer movie blockbuster, there are people around the world struggling to live with the bare minimum. In some parts of the world, children are forced to live in underserved communities that lack communal areas suitable for children to play. Fortunately, Cornerstone Fellowship has partnered up with Kids Around the World to promote Playground Project 2018.

Playground Project 2018 is about more than just helping children to have fun. Through community support, Cornerstone Fellowship uses its donations to send high school and college students to various parts of the world to restore community parks and playgrounds. The fellowship explains how giving back has inspired greater change in their local community, which then transcends to other parts of the world. With one commitment in mind, Cornerstone Fellowship will, without a doubt, spread love, positivity and most importantly, bring smiles to children of Panama.

“Kelvin is just one example of the kids we’ve had the joy of connecting with over the years in Santa Catalina,” they explain on their donation page, adding “When we first met him, he was one of the kids attending VBS…now he’s young man who has worked alongside us in our last couple trips to Panama.”

Cornerstone Fellowship is serving the community through:

  • VBS Surf and Skate Ministry
  • The team sprucing up the local schools
  • Providing children with a variety of games
  • Serving those in need in various parts of the world

However, Cornerstone Fellowship also plans to build a playground that will have a positive and lasting impact on the community of Santa Catalina.

“We are partnering with Kids Around the World (www.kidsaroundtheworld.com) and some locals in the community to build an amazing playground so that we can seize this opportunity to not only go and love the people of Santa Catalina, but also give a generational gift that will impact their entire community.” –Cornerstone Fellowship

It takes a community to raise a village

As a family-owned agency, Doctor Genius is passionate about investing in community outreach programs that give families the opportunity to prosper in healthy environments. As we help medical professionals increase their reach in the digital landscape, we also see a huge significance in investing in our future generations. Helping to build a community that can provide children the love, hope and guidance they need; which is exactly what we’re all about!

We hope our contribution of $5,000 will make an impact on Cornerstone Fellowship to complete their mission and provide the children of Panama a safe and enjoyable childhood experience they deserve. If you would like to support this cause with any amount, donate here. Any contribution helps.

prevPost.title: Google’s “Medic Update” Turns Healthcare SEO Upside Down!
prevPost.excerpt: But Doctor Genius Clients Are Still Thriving… Here’s why… In 2016, a study based on 1 million Google search results [ More.. ]
prevPost.content:
But Doctor Genius Clients Are Still Thriving…

Here’s why…

In 2016, a study based on 1 million Google search results confirmed that content, backlinks, and site speed were the 3 most important factors to determine first-page ranking. (Backlinko)

So our Genius Team went back to the drawing board and developed a strategy that would certainly be ahead of the curve, benefiting our clients in the long-term. As your website is the catalyst for new patient inquiries, we forecasted a major industry change approaching quickly and we’re happy we did!

In 2017, we began creating new and improved frameworks that focused primarily on site quality as well as what potential challenges might arise in this ever-evolving digital world.

In August 2018, Google released its most significant update toward the healthcare industry, affecting nearly 40% of all medical websites.

 

 

How do I know if my practice has been affected?

No worries, we’ll give you the inside track on exactly what we’ve done to secure our client’s current performance and how we’ve better prepared them for any future turbulence.To prepare for this major change, our team implemented a comprehensive strategy that would protect our clients from any detrimental ranking downturns or damages to their overall online presence.

As Google fully deployed the “Medic Update,” Doctor Genius found that our client’s were positively impacted due to proper marketing methods equipped with a well-executed online strategy. Whereas many other Healthcare Professionals are still experiencing the repercussions of this massive global update, attempting to repair and restore their on and offline visibility.

So what’s to come?

Let us break it down for you:

  • By 2020 50% of all searches will be voice searches. (Comscore)
  • Voice search results are significantly more likely to use HTTPS than other websites ranking on Google’s first page. (Backlinko)
    • Don’t worry, our sites are encrypted and secure.
  • The average word count of a voice search result page is 2,312 words. Therefore, Google tends to source voice search answers from long-form content. (Backlinko)
    • On average, our client’s service pages contain 2,500 words or more.
    • Long-form content provides the algorithm more opportunities to “match” as a voice search result.
  • The higher a page ranks for a specific keyword, the more likely Google is to choose that page as the voice search result.
    • When’s the last time you’ve audited your current marketing strategy?
    • Doctor Genius provides their clients with an easy to use, personalized practice management dashboard.
      • Check out our advanced marketing technology.
  • Simple, easy-to-read content helps with voice search SEO. The average Google voice search result is written at ninth grade level. (Backlinko)
    • FAQ components can be found within each service page of our client’s websites.
    • FAQ pages are in a format that’s perfect for voice search: a conversational question and a brief answer right underneath it. (Search Engine Land)
    • These questions are formatted to read on a high school level to easily communicate with the algorithm. With the use of simple language, patients and Google can easily identify your business as the optimal search result which benefits the overall visibility of the practice.


So what does this mean for your practice?

Doctor Genius is committed to provide top-of-the-line personalized management, equipped with full transparency and quantifiable results. Since the major algorithm update in August 2018, Doctor Genius’ overall client base has seen a significant impact of about 36% increase in online traffic. 

Remember: you don’t need to be a marketing genius to be successful, you just need one by your side.

Who is Doctor Genius?

At Doctor Genius, we work with clients to expand their healthcare private practice by helping them reach, engage and convert consumers into new patients. By offering high-end web marketing services to medical and health professionals throughout the United States, we help clients gain more profit and build trustworthy relationships with patients to initiate sustainable practice growth.

We construct a website for your practice, establish an active online presence, build and constantly update social media profiles, help you build stronger connections with patients, streamline the appointment scheduling process, funnel traffic from search engines directly to your website and much more. 

If you would like more information about the Medic Update or you are interested in scheduling a complimentary practice evaluation, please contact our Marketing Specialists. 

To begin the process of increasing the success and presence of your practice, give us a call at 877-477-2311.
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: What Healthcare Professionals need to know about Google's "Medic Update", from impaced sites to upcoming trends, Doctor Genius will give you the inside look...

nextPost.title: Doctor Genius Joins Over 500 Exhibitors at the CDA Presents The Art and Science of Dentistry, Anaheim 2018
nextPost.excerpt: The California Dental Association brings together a variety of healthcare professionals from all areas of dentistry for one monumental event. [ More.. ]
nextPost.content:
The California Dental Association brings together a variety of healthcare professionals from all areas of dentistry for one monumental event. This event is a weekend full of the latest advancements in dentistry, courses on effective dental practice techniques, over 550 exhibitors from all areas of the dental market and a plethora of speakers; among which, Doctor Genius will be present. The event takes place on Thursday, May 17th through Saturday, May 19th, 2018, at the Anaheim Convention Center.

Doctor Genius will be at exhibiting at booth #244 with more information on how we can help grow your private practice. We will also be offering a chance to win a 75” flat screen TV, Google Home Max, and various other prizes with any demo completed at our booth. As the CDA attracts over 26,000 attendees, this dental convention allows you and your team to meet and speak with like-minded professionals who are also searching for innovative and effective ways to enhance their dental practice.

The latest tools of the trade

Partnering with Doctor Genius allows clients to put a strong foot forward with a professional, mobile-first website. Our Doctor Genius Team utilizes key marketing techniques to extend our client’s reach online which is consistently maintained and audited through our proprietary software, also known as our Doctor Genius Client Portal.

While we are available over the phone, we are also located locally in Irvine, CA. Our area of expertise lies in dominating local markets all while attracting new business to help sustainably grow your private practice on and offline.

Doctor Genius is a Google Premier Partner that provides clients with all-inclusive packages that reach, engage and convert consumers into patients.

Stop by and give us a visit

No matter the skill of a professional in any field of dentistry, advanced tools and equipment can help make any dental procedure a breeze. The CDA hosts such an event in which there are a variety of booths offering the latest technological achievements for dentistry on the market.

One tool that will help professionals attract and retain new patients is online marketing. For more information on our booth location at the CDA event or more information on our online services, give us a call today. We hope to see you there.
